id: Clarify your Small Business with Notion
name: Clarify your Small Business with Notion
description: This is a part of a full package called the Notion Small Business Kit.Since so many aspects are included in the creation and development of your small business, it is quite easy to get confused. These pages will help you to sort the important details and information about your small business to get you started.What's insideSmall business (describe your small business)Customers (identify your customers)Products/services (clarify your products/services)Competitors (identify your competitors)Market
features: Small business (describe your small business); Customers (identify your customers); Products/services (clarify your products/services); Competitors (identify your competitors); Marketing (clarify your marketing); Required (list required things)
